btnsettings.no_config_tips: The toggle button will not take effect if $$$$ client configuration is not added.
btnsettings.startup_tips: Note: After the device is rebooted, {func} will be enabled if the toggle switch is on, otherwise it will be disabled.
btnsettings.auto_sync_tips: 应用会根据拨动开关状态重新设置{func}，是否确认应用？
